action.action-desc: Mr. Gimenez (for himself, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Diaz-Balart, and Ms. Malliotakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To establish an office to combat the global rise of authoritarian socialism and communism at the Department of State, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 1 of the State Department Basic Authorities Act is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Special envoy To combat global rise of authoritarian socialism and communism
subsection.text: There is established, within the Department of State, an office to combat the global rise of authoritarian socialism and communism at the Department of State, which shall be headed by a Special Envoy.
